name: Disco Bullets
description:
Disco Bullets is an intense, fast-pace and pretty hardcore shooter game. It is fun, easy to learn and addicting. Defeat the evil disco monster, survive countless waves of enemies and break your highscore. Will you be able to survive the deadliest disco night ever?

So whats going on?
  • A disco full of crazy mindless monsters is waiting for you
  • A fun bonus bouncy castle for even more fun
  • A big selection of different weapons
  • Basically infinte waves of enemies
  • Special enemy types will spawn over time
  • Fun game design
  • A fast, intuitive and very addicting gameplay
  • Defeat the mad disco monster army
  • Beat your highscore
  • Survive the party night
